title: It's All Fun and Games
description:
It’s all fun and games...until someone gets hurt. This week’s stories are all about deadly games and rituals. First, we’ll play the Game of the Red Eye. Next, we’ll prank call a babysitter, learn the origins of Bloody Mary, and hear about a mysterious mascot suit at a football game.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
